user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Tom at HopeBridge Foundation (tom@hopebridgefoundation.org) with some insights on assisting refugee students. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Email with Insights on Supporting Refugee Students

Dear Professor Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please compose and send an email to Tom at HopeBridge Foundation (tom@hopebridgefoundation.org) sharing your insights on how best to assist refugee students? If helpful, feel free to consult the materials you’ve collected in your Notion workspace while putting the message together.

Thank you very much for your time and expertise—your guidance will be invaluable to Tom and his team.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]

final_output:
